pageContext.claim: “I've been going through this for three years. They've been trying to impeach me from the day I got elected.”
pageContext.analysis: A Democratic House member would time and again offer an resolution for impeachment as early as July 2017, but such efforts were quickly defeated or pushed aside in the GOP-controlled House. Not until Democrats took control of the House was impeachment even a possibility, and even then House Speaker Nancy Pelosi long resisted taking that step.
